origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.compare_packages', 'description': 'This function compares insurance packages from different companies based on the policy type and coverage amount.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of insurance policy, e.g., auto, home, life.'}, {'name': 'coverageAmount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The amount of coverage desired.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparisonResult', 'description': 'The comparison results of different insurance packages.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.compare_packages, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'auto', 'coverageAmount'是'50000'.
